text: The Pennsylvania State Senate is the upper house of the Pennsylvania General Assembly. It has 50 seats and is currently controlled by the Republican Party. Senators are elected for four year terms with no term limits.Article II, section 3, Pennsylvania Constitution. ==Senate leadership== President of the Senate: John Fetterman (D) President Pro Tem of the Senate: Jake Corman (R) Majority party (R) Leadership position Minority party (D) Kim Ward Floor Leader Jay Costa John Gordner Whip Anthony H.
